name: Talk_Neimi
_source: speak;Eirika;Thank you for your help, Neimi.|We can't thank you enough.
speak;Neimi;Oh! Ah...|You're welcome...|S-sorry, I've got to keep my eye on Colm.|Do you mind?...
speak;Neimi;T-those monsters... They were horrible!...|T-they almost... They almost... *sob*
speak;Eirika;I'd like to thank you again for your aid.|It's meant a lot to us, backing us up from range.
speak;Neimi;H-has it?|It's been odd... Shooting people really is different from hunting...
speak;Eirika;...I see. It must be hard...|But know we're thankful for your support.
speak;Eirika;Of course!|Take a bit to unwind. It'll help to lift your spirits!
speak;Eirika;I know so!|And I think we'd all be happier for seeing your smile!
speak;Neimi;He he! Gosh!...|Alright, I'll try! Thank you so much, Princess!
speak;Neimi;Y-yeah! Uhm... These ones are said to ward evil.|I wanna give them to the locals...
speak;Eirika;Neimi... That's so kind of you...|Here, let me help.
speak;Neimi;T-thank you, Princess... *sniff*...|I-I don't want anyone else to suffer like us...
speak;Eirika;What are you looking at, Neimi?
speak;Neimi;Oh! J-just the ballista, Princess.|I've always wondered how these work...|I-if I can learn something... Maybe tweak my bow...|Maybe I can actually pull my weight, you know?
speak;Eirika;Neimi...|It's very thoughtful of you, truly.... But you're enough.|We're here for you, too, alright?.
speak;Neimi;I... Wah...|O-okay! Thank you, Princess. Really...
speak;Eirika;Sitting by the chests again, Neimi?
speak;Eirika;I hope it's not too boring, sitting around for that long...
speak;Neimi;I-I'm used to it by now!|I can restring my bow... Make some more arrows... Write in my journal...
speak;Neimi;Y-yeah! I just, uhm...|My grandpa got me into it, a long time ago.|I-I write about things that make me happy, y'know?.
speak;Eirika;Oh! What a sweet idea!|Don't let me interrupt you, then!
speak;Neimi;Yeah! W-we have the time, don't we?|It feels really nice!|It's so cool, and refreshing! He he he!
speak;Eirika;He he! So it is!|Maybe I should join you...
speak;Eirika;Doesn't the valley look pretty from up here, Neimi?
speak;Neimi;Yeah!|I could stay here for hours.|It's so relaxing...
speak;Eirika;... Ah! Sorry, did I wake you up, Neimi?
speak;Neimi;Y-you're okay, Princess!|Don't mind me! I'm just... Tired...
speak;Eirika;No, it's alright. You'll need your rest.|Good night, Neimi.
speak;Eirika;Need any help moving those remains, Neimi?
speak;Neimi;I-I'm fine!...|Just...|W-why'd I have to go and drop 'em? Stupid...
speak;Eirika;Are these your arrows you're collecting, Neimi?
speak;Neimi;Ah! No...|I'm collecting the enemy's lost arrows.|They're really high quality, yeah?|Though, I-I guess military-grade arrows would be.|And, hey, easier if I don't have to make them!...
speak;Eirika;I see!|I suppose you do usually have to make your own...|Must be convenient!
speak;Neimi;Yeah!|S-saves me a bunch of time!|So I can focus on other things...
speak;Neimi;Oh, just bow upkeep stuff.|Making bowstring... Keeping my bow wound up...
speak;Eirika;...I see.|Pardon me, I'm just... Not sure what I expected.
speak;Eirika;Can you track down the Queen, Neimi?
speak;Neimi;W-well, I'm trying my old hunting tricks!|Whoever took her is good, though...|T-the tracks get all messy past the stairs, see?
speak;Eirika;Neimi? Are you alright?|You look like you are about to faint...
speak;Neimi;The sun is soooo hot...|I'm so parched...|I need something quenchy...
speak;Eirika;...Quenchy?|Neimi...I think you need to sit down...
speak;Neimi;I am sitting down!|I'm just waiting for something quenchy...|Y-yeah, the quenchiest...
speak;Eirika;Neimi...|Thank you so much for your help.|If you still need a place to stay, after the war...|It's not much, but I can offer you a room in the castle.
speak;Neimi;What?! P-Princess, you can't be serious! A room, for me? In this castle?!
speak;Eirika;I don't see why not!|You've done a lot for us. Please, make yourself at home.
speak;Neimi;*Sob*...|I-I'm sorry, I shouldn't...|*Sniff*...|I can't stop crying, I just...
speak;Eirika;Oh, Neimi...|We will be happy to have you here, I just know it.
speak;Eirika;Neimi, can you use your tracking skills to find Lyon?
speak;Neimi;...I-I'm sorry, but...|I don't think I'll be much good, tracking a mage...|S-since he teleported, and all...
speak;Eirika;I see...|I figured, but it was worth a shot.
speak;Neimi;I wish my skills were better...|T-then you could find your friend, and...|*sniff*
speak;Eirika; Ah! Neimi...|No, please, I didn't mean it like that...|I'm sorry. Don't cry, please...
speak;Eirika;Will you be alright in the heat this time, Neimi?
speak;Eirika;I don't know...|You're sweating a lot...
speak;Neimi;I guess I could use some water...
speak;Eirika;Okay, wait here.|I'll get you some water.
speak;Eirika;You'd better not cry here, Neimi.|You're losing a lot of water as is...
speak;Eirika;... Neimi?|If you were still up, I just wanted to let you know that...
speak;Eirika;Awwww...|She's already asleep.|She's been working so hard, hasn't she?|I shouldn't bother her, then.
speak;Neimi;Princess...|This is the final battle, right?|That temple looks scary...

speak;Eirika;Hopefully, it is...|Neimi, you've helped us so much.|Dare I say, you've become as strong as you wished to be!|I know that place looks scary, but...|May I ask for your help, one last time?
speak;Neimi;I will fight.|Even though it's scary...|I will fight with you.|I want Magvel to be peaceful...
speak;Eirika;Thank you, Neimi.|You know, my father taught me something before...|About strength.
speak;Neimi;Strength?|I... I wanna be strong...|S-so I can protect the people I love...

speak;Eirika;Well, that's just the thing!|He always told me that strength wasn't just about physical might...|It was about having the courage to do what is right.|You have that courage in spades, Neimi.|You're so much stronger than you think. Never forget that.
speak;Neimi;...P-Princess... I...|*sniff*... I-it's been an honor, ehe...
speak;Ephraim;You, young lady.|Is that a bow you're messing with?
speak;Neimi;M-me?!|Ah! Y-yes...|I'm w-working on the, uh... String... On my b-bow...
speak;Ephraim;Hmmmm...|It's well-kept.|You must be a good archer.|What's your name?
speak;Neimi;M-my name is, uh, Neimi, S-Sir!
speak;Ephraim;Neimi, huh?|Let me see you shoot.|See if you can hit that pillar over there.
speak;Ephraim;You might even be a better shot than Innes...
speak;Neimi;T-the prince of-?!|N-no way!|Don't say things like that, please!
speak;Ephraim;Neimi, that armory's low on their supply of bowstrings.|Think you could help them?
speak;Ephraim;Why are you so nervous around me, Neimi?|Am I that scary?
speak;Ephraim;I see...|I apologize, Neimi.|I don't mean to be intimidating.
speak;Neimi;I-it's ok...|Your face just scares me, for some reason...
speak;Ephraim;My face?|Well...|This might be difficult then...
speak;Ephraim;Do you see any other ships in the horizon, Neimi?
speak;Neimi;N-no, it looks clear all around us...
speak;Ephraim;Good, thank you for looking.|... I'm sorry if I still scare you.
speak;Neimi;It's okay...|You're at least not as scary as the monsters...
speak;Ephraim;Is that so?|Well, I didn't think I would be happy to lose to monsters in that way.
speak;Neimi;He he!|That's a funny way to put it, Sir!
speak;Ephraim;Huh, finally got you to laugh.|I think we're making some progress, then!
speak;Ephraim;Neimi, can you do some recon in the forests over there later?|I want to make sure we are safe up north.
speak;Neimi;Yes, Sir!|Forests are my, uhm...|Y-you could call them my home turf!|I feel safer there... S-sometimes.|Depends, really...
speak;Ephraim;Alright, good.|I trust you with that, then.|Burn this torch if you run into trouble.|We'll come to your aid.
speak;Ephraim;Huh...|She sure seems a different person when she's not scared...
speak;Ephraim;Neimi, can you check on the villages, and see what they need?
speak;Neimi;Yes, Sir!|I'll take the route by the river.|It seems so calm, and pretty...
speak;Ephraim;Hmm. You're right, it is pretty|The whole landscape is, really.|No wonder the villagers live here.|There's plenty of water, and they can fish by the sea...
speak;Neimi;This would be a nice place to live.|Maybe I could live here some day...
speak;Neimi;Maybe! At least, some place like this.|A place with rivers, forests, the sea...
speak;Ephraim;That does seem nice.|I hope you find somewhere nice to live when this war is over.
speak;Ephraim;Can I ask you to look after the female servants, Neimi?|They could use a gentle soul like yours right now.
speak;Neimi;Yes, Sir.|I understand.|I'll help treat them.|They must have been through a lot...
speak;Ephraim;Exactly why I need you.|You're one of the few people I trust to handle this.|They deserve help and respect.
speak;Neimi;That's so kind of you, Prince Ephraim...
speak;Ephraim;Everything alright, Neimi?|You look dazed...|You're not about to faint, are you?
speak;Neimi;Wehhhh...|The sun is soooo hot...|I'm so parched...|I need something quenchy...
speak;Ephraim;What? That's not...|Neimi, sit down. That's an order.|Don't exert yourself any further until you feel better.
speak;Neimi;I-I am sitting down!|I'm just waiting for something quenchy...|Y-yeah, the quenchiest...
speak;Ephraim;... I'm getting a healer.|Please just...|Just stay right there.
speak;Ephraim;Actually, I was just here to thank you.|You're not exactly the fighting sort...|But you've helped my sister and I all this way.|We appreciate it more than you could know.
speak;Neimi;O-oh! It's...|I-it's really nothing! Just doing what's right...

speak;Ephraim;I'd say it's more than that...|Especially for someone as gentle as you.|Hence, I'd like to let you know I've allocated a bit of the treasury for something.|Namely, finding you a home after the war.
speak;Neimi;W-wuh?|S-Sir-!|P-Prince Ephraim, y-you can't be serious!...

speak;Ephraim;Eirika told me everything.|We have a lot to sort out, but...|If I can give some small kindness to one of my people, I'd be proud to.|So... When the war's over, we'll find you somewhere like that village, yeah?|Somewhere to settle down.
speak;Neimi;B-but you...|But... But I...|*sniff* C'mon, Neimi, don't...
speak;Neimi;*Sob*|I-I'm sorry, sir, I...|...I-I shouldn't be crying right now, I just...
speak;Ephraim;Neimi...|Well, it must be a lot to hear, at a time like this.|Don't worry. You can cry it out. We'll talk when you're ready.
speak;Ephraim;Neimi, can you use your tracking skills to find Lyon?
speak;Neimi;...I-I'm sorry, but...|I don't think I'll be much good, tracking a mage...|S-since he teleported, and all...
speak;Neimi;W-what? No, Sir, I...|No, I-I'm the one who's sorry!
speak;Neimi;I-if I was just a bit better, then...|T-then maybe you wouldn't have...|I-I mean, you'd find your friend, and... *sniff*...
speak;Ephraim;Neimi, no, no...|It was too big an ask for you.|Don't cry, okay?|You didn't do anything wrong...
speak;Ephraim;Neimi, are you going to be alright?|You took the heat pretty poorly last time...
speak;Ephraim;You're sweating a lot.|Neimi, if you're struggling, you have to tell me.
speak;Neimi;I... I guess I could use some water...
speak;Ephraim;Alright. Thank you for telling me.|I'll get you some water, just sit tight.
speak;Neimi;Thank you, Prince Ephraim...|*Sniff*... S-sorry for bothering you...
speak;Ephraim;Neimi, don't cry. Your wellbeing is important.|Besides, it's better not to lose more water in this heat...
speak;Ephraim;Neimi, I'm here to relieve you of your duty.|Go get some-
speak;Ephraim;Looks like she was ahead of me.|She's been working so hard, huh?|Rest easy, then.
speak;Neimi;Prince Ephraim...|This is the final battle, right?|That temple looks scary...

speak;Ephraim;Here's hoping.|Neimi, you've helped us a lot, through this damned war.|More than I imagine you'd ever have wanted to.|It's unfair to ask, I know, but...|Can we count on your bow one last time?
speak;Neimi;I-I will fight.|I-it's scary, and dark... But...|I will fight with you.|I-if I don't, Magvel won't find peace...
speak;Neimi;I-it's nothing...|I just...|I want to be strong. For the people I love...

speak;Ephraim;...My father said the strongest men weren't the greatest warriors.|They were those with the biggest hearts, and the strongest wills.|Neimi, by that metric, you're as strong as they come.|So, I hope that's a dream fulfilled.
speak;Neimi;...P-Prince... I...|*sniff*... I-it's been an honor, ehe...
